SELECT m.month AS label,ifnull(u.num,0) AS num FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') AS month UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 8 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 9 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 10 MONTH), '%Y-%m') UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m') ) m
LEFT JOIN
(
SELECT ifnull(COUNT(*),0) AS num, DATE_FORMAT(add_date, '%Y-%m') AS month FROM user_info WHERE add_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 12 MONTH GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(add_date, '%Y-%m') ) u ON m.month=u.month order by m.month asc
